issue.title: RecordBatch::ToStructArray cannot handle record batches with 0 column
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9098](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9098). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If RecordBatch::ToStructArray is called against a record batch with 0 column, the following error will be raised:

Invalid: Can't infer struct array length with 0 child arrays
